Configuration Engineer @ DreamSoft

Zhengzhou R&D Centre, Dec. 2023 — Jan. 2024 Mentor: Mengyu Li Responsibility: · Managed the daily operations and maintenance of the office automation system in Shanghai's Jing'an District, ensuring system stability through continuous monitoring and performance optimization. · Assisted in the development of new features and optimization of the office automation system, involving requirement analysis, system design, coding, testing, and deployment. · Troubleshot system issues effectively, contributing to the enhancement of user experience and system reliability.

“得之坦然，失之淡然，争其必然，顺其自然”
